headline: Assessing S&P Global (SPGI) Valuation After Analyst Optimism On Debt Issuance And IPO Activity
summary: Analyst call puts S&P Global (SPGI) in focus A recent analyst report argued that S&P Global could benefit from heavier debt financing activity as lower interest rates and a busy IPO calendar support issuance, and the stock gained 4% after the call. See our latest analysis for S&P Global. The analyst call comes after a steady build in momentum, with a 30-day share price return of 6.9% and a 90-day share price return of 10.46%. The 1-year total shareholder return sits at 9.26% against a current...
